author: Tommi Hartikainen
comment: Haven't found many watchfaces which I would use as daily driver, but this seems promising. Though I would like to see in future updates possiblity to turn on/off more items on screen. Like digital watch, compass points etc. Also icons for shortcuts would be great.  Watch crashed once after installing this, but hopefully that was only one and last time it does this. But gonna keep using this and see how our life together goes. =)

reply.author: Karat
reply.content: Thanks a lot for the review, will try my best to make your rating to 5 stars :)

author: Jason Anderson
comment: Love the look, hate the battery life. Using this app drains my battery 50% more than other apps.  For example using minimal and Elegant I can get over 2 days battery, using this I can only get one.  Until the battery life is fixed I cannot use it.

author: David Wong
comment: Had my Moto 360 Gen 1 for almost 2 years now and this is the 1st watchface email I've ever bought so I really wanted to like it, did my research and jumped in.  Unfortunately, seems to chew through battery life like crazy. Thought it was the weather refresh so I changed it to every 24 hours, still uses what I consider an excessive amount of power.  Had it on the first time anxiety within 9 hours I had 20% battery life left.  Restarted my phone and watch, charged to 100% and 7-8 hours later 34% left.  Don't get me wrong, design and appearance is great which is why I  decided to make it my first purchase, just need the battery life last longer. On my usual watchface I still have about 40% left after a 15 hour day. With an estimated life of about 31 hours.   Sorry really wish it would've been different.

author: Sean Porter
comment: Good looking watch face - especially like the weather info given directly on the face. Thank you. Would like to be able to customise the larger dial contents... I'm not too bothered with steps considering I am disabled - So maybe a bigger date with shortcut to my calendar app on the watch? I'll be using this a lot mainly for it's weather info.
title: Great watch face

author: Dave Lufkin
comment: Thanks for making a well-designed face for both round AND square watches. Nice choice of display items.cwoukd be nice if I could lock colors down separately and still get to the app shortcuts. Nicely done!

author: Darren Swartzendruber
comment: Love the look and the options. How easy would it be to make the compass actually function?

reply.author: Karat
reply.content:
Hi, yes I know, I wanted it to include, but I have only moto 360 1st gen (doesn't support compass) to test, as soon as I purchase huawei watch I'll make it functional :-) 
And thanks a lot for the review!

title: Great watch face

author: elad friedberg
comment: Nice watchface, I'll give 5 stars when the date display will be bigger, when there will be option to hide the digital  display, and shortcuts to other,  more useful application.. But in general grate watch face.

author: SRT Racing
comment: So far it's my favorite watch face, good job!

reply.author: Karat
reply.content: Thanks a lot for the review!

title: Nice !!

author: Marcos Rodriguez
comment: I love it. My favorite function is that I can change the color with a simple tap, allowing me to coordinate my watch with my ties without having to change watchfaces or thinking to much about it.
title: Looks great.

author: Raymond Li
comment: The watch face is fully functional and beautiful, but could you add a option to adjust the display on time since 5s is really too short.

author: Marc Thomas
comment: Great watchface,by a great dev.
title: Fan-bloody-tastic

author: Alexander Davey
comment: On the Huawei smart watch when the screen goes inactive the face goes all grey, is there anyway for the hands to stay coloured? Great watchface regardless
title: Love it

author: C Wolfe
comment: Beautifully done! Customizable colors and customizable tap action menu are fantastic.  👍⌚😎

reply.author: Karat
reply.content: Thanks a lot for the review!

author: Mark Jones
comment: Best face I've ever bought .
title: Moto 360 2nd gen

author: Charles -Nzohabonayo
comment: Give option to change degrees from fareinate to celicius used i uk

reply.author: Karat
reply.content: Hi, open on your phone Android Wear app, then press Airborne, then in the bottom choose Celsius. That's it. Enjoy!

author: Lotfi Jabber
comment: My favorite watch face. Love the look and function

author: Trina B.
comment: Great features with good battery life!

author: Yusuf Gustiar
comment: mantaff
title: oke

author: Buga Gigio
comment: Great watch face

author: Mo Alsharaf
comment: It will do for now. I might delete in few days; it doesn't look premium. Weather settings should allow for manual city option; I'm a traveller and don't care much for auto location on phone. The dual battery symbols (watch and phone) are too small and look like annoying dots even on my large watch dial - LG Watch Urbane. I'm a watch face enthusiast and have three premium smartwatches.

reply.author: Karat
reply.content: Hi, even if you've refunded your review is still here, please can you fix this issue? Thanks a lot! I can give you promo code for any other watch face of mine you like, please fix this review.

title: Flat look

author: ROB
comment: Another great watchface for my collection

reply.author: Karat
reply.content: Thanks a lot for the review!

title: Awesome

author: Reece Williams
comment: Since android update, there is no settings to select on a phone. So you can't change simple things like weather c or f. There is no settings on the watch either. Only option is random colour pressing.

reply.author: Karat
reply.content: Hi, as you've stated "since Android update", it's not due to our app. Please go to: Android Wear app, then press settings, then your watch and press -> Resync apps. Then wait a while. If not helps, then uninstall and install again. If this not helps, factory reset watch, unbind it, then install again. Please write to us if any problem with this.

title: No settings app

author: Charles Gaushell
comment: Phone only gives me uninstall function. No access to settings on phone or watch.

reply.author: Karat
reply.content: Please open Android Wear app on your phone, then choose Airborne settings, then change any settings you wish.

title: Can't set shortcuts

author: Robert Heien
comment: Can't get it to show up anywhere

reply.author: Karat
reply.content: Hi, you should have Android Wear app on your phone, then install it, if it doesn't appear on Android Wear app, you should access to its settings and push Resync Apps, and wait about a 30 min, it should appear on your watch.

title: Won't load
